Text: FreshTrax Newsletter and OPENINGDo not reply to this email to be removed from this list follow the directions below Well here is the great news We will be open tomorrow for the winter season We have received about inches of new snow over the weekend and today allowing us to open tomorrow with our Shoshone Quad Chair from AM PM Tomorrows lift ticket price is only Only the Shoshone area will be open We are planning to open the Dreamcatcher Quad to the summit of Freds Mtn by Wed or Thurs I will send another email out when we know We also have a FREE SKI DAY for our Vertical Value Plus Card members Go to this site for more info wintermountainfrequenthtml Current specials include Book a or day package from Nov Dec conditions permitting and your full day Snowcat Powder Adventure is ABSOLUTELY FREE Thats a savings of per person If one free day on the cat doesnt satisfy you then book a day package and enjoy free days of cat skiing night Ski Day Perfect Family Packages from only per adult double occupancy during super saver season Call TARGHEE for more details or go online wwwgrandtargheecom Ski ya soon Ken The Cam Op To be removed from this list simply type an email to In the body of the mail simply typeunsubscribe grandtarghee
